import React from 'react' import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import rock from '../assets/1.jpg' import scissor from '../assets/2.png' import paper from '../assets/3.png' import white from '../assets/bg_picture.png' import '../App.css' export const Game = (props) => { const userStep = () => { switch (props.userStep) { case 'r': return rock case 's': return scissor case 'p': return paper } } const compStep = () => { switch (props.computerStep) { case 'r': return rock case 's': return scissor case 'p': return paper } } return ( <>
You picked {props.userStep === 'r' ? 'Rock' : props.userStep === 's' ? 'Scissor' : 'Paper'}
The Computer picked {props.computerStep === 'r' ? 'Rock' : props.computerStep === 's' ? 'Scissor' : 'Paper'}
{props.userStep && }
{props.message}
{}
{props.message &&
{props.message}
}
{/*

{props.message}

*/} { props.message && } ) }
